title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install from PyPI as `ollama`.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; install from npm as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; available on PyPI as `langchain-ollama`.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact `io.github.amithkoujalgi:ollama4j`.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper (Go) that adds progress bars and colored output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into any channel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers questions via Ollama; deploy with Ray Serve.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama; install via `nimble install ollama`.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate `ollama-rs` providing typed async/sync APIs to Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for Ollama; distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside notes.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Ollama Modelfiles and quantization recipes.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.
